testcase.classname: To validate the functionality of flipkart to add a product to cart
testcase.name: To launch flipkart
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch flipkart...........................................passed When close the popup........................................................passed And user should search a product using keyword..............................passed And user should add some filters and click a product........................passed Then user should navigate to product detail page............................passed Then user should Add a product to cart......................................passed
